text: "Dancing the Night Away" is a 1977 song by country singer Tanya Tucker and is the third single from her seventh studio album Ridin' Rainbows. It went to number 16 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and number 19 on the Canadian RPM Country Singles charts. It has been covered by Leo Sayer and Crystal Gayle. ==Track listing== ;7" vinyl single * "Dancing the Night Away" – 3:31 * "Let's Keep It That Way" – 3:52 ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:Country songs Category:Tanya Tucker songs Category:Leo Sayer songs Category:Crystal Gayle songs
